params.amountInETH: The amount to be borrowed, in ETH
params.asset: The address of the asset to borrow
params.interestRateMode: The interest rate mode at which the user is borrowing
params.maxStableLoanPercent: The max amount of the liquidity that can be borrowed at stable rate, in percentage
params.reserve: The reserve state from which the user is borrowing
params.reserves: The addresses of all the active reserves
params.reservesData: The state of all the reserves
params.userConfig: The state of the user for the specific reserve

params.reserve: The reserve object on which the user is depositing

validateRebalanceStableBorrowRate(DataTy.details: Validates a stable borrow rate rebalance action

params.aTokenAddress: The address of the aToken contract
params.reserve: The reserve state on which the user is getting rebalanced

params.amountSent: The amount sent for the repayment. Can be an actual value or uint(-1)
params.onBehalfOf: The address of the user msg.sender is repaying for
params.reserve: The reserve state from which the user is repaying
params.stableDebt: The borrow balance of the user
params.variableDebt: The borrow balance of the user

validateSetUseReserveAsCollateral(DataTy.details: Validates the action of setting an asset as collateral

params.reserve: The state of the reserve that the user is enabling or disabling as collateral
params.reserves: The addresses of all the active reserves
params.reservesData: The data of all the reserves
params.userConfig: The state of the user for the specific reserve

validateSwapRateMode(DataTypes.ReserveDa.details: Validates a swap of borrow rate mode.

params.currentRateMode: The rate mode of the borrow
params.reserve: The reserve state on which the user is swapping the rate
params.stableDebt: The stable debt of the user
params.variableDebt: The variable debt of the user

userdoc.notice: Implements functions to validate the different actions of the protocol
